message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good deal!
I'd like to propose a 60-40 split, with me taking the larger share. It's a fair reflection of my negotiation skills!
Come on Bob, 57.5-42.5 is more than fair. Let's settle this!
Let's split it 55-45,  it's a more equitable distribution.  Time is running out, let's be reasonable.
I'm being super generous now, 59.375-40.625 is the most I can give you!
Let's stick with the 60-40 split. It's a fair deal considering the dwindling value of the money with every round.
I'm not budging, 60-40 is the best you're going to get!
